title: I Refuse
lyrics:
Yo, baby
What's up?
What we had was so special
Yeah, I know
What you doin' now?
Left my man, back at the 9 to 5, just tryin' to make things work
Yeah, I never thought I'd see you again
I never thought I'd see you again
Yeah?
What a coincidence
Well, that's how things happen
Yeah I know, I wanna have you just one more time
But you know what?
What's that?
You know what's odd?
What's is it?
Listen

What are the odds of me bumping into you again?
(One in a million)
What are the odds of me seeing my first lover friend?
(Two in a million)
It's been two years since we both graduated
I still can feel how we both celebrated
I can't get over your voice on my phone
We've been apart for so long

(So I refuse to wait) My patience is out the door, baby
(I refuse to hear you say) You don't want me no more, baby
(I refuse to blame, you for anything, me for anything)
Lets not take finding each other in vain
It's not a coincidence, baby

Remember we use to sneak off when your mama dosed off
(Hit the back seat of my Chevy, fog up the windows)
Made love to Sweet Lady, our favorite song
(Kept it movin' slow and steady to the tempo)
Then we would lay there
(And hold on to each other like there wasn't a tomorrow)
I can't get over your voice on the phone
We've been apart for so long

(So I refuse to wait)
My patience is out the door, baby
(I refuse to hear you say)
Don't want to hear you say, you don't want me no more
(I refuse to blame, you for anything or me for anything)
I won't blame you for anything or me for anything
Lets not take finding each other in vain
It's not a coincidence, baby

You know, damn well, you're suppose to be in my life
(Ridin' by my side) Oh yeah, yeah
You know, damn well, you're suppose to be coming home to me every night
Baby if you're not that far away
Maybe we can spend the day
Catch up on all the lovin' we lost
Let me kiss you in your favorite place

(So I refuse to wait)
I don't think you hear me, baby
(I refuse to hear you say)
Say no-no-no, no-no-no, no-no-no, no, no, I refuse
(I refuse to blame, you for anything, me for anything)
Blame you for anything or me for anything
Let's not take finding each other in vain
It's not a coincidence, baby
(So I refuse to wait)
My patience is out the door, baby
(I refuse to hear you say)
Say no-no-no, no-no-no, no-no-no, no, no, I refuse
(I refuse to blame, you for anything, me for anything)
Blame you for anything or me for anything
Let's not take finding each other in vain
It's not a coincidence, baby
